title: NeoArt
description:
NeoArt is a web-based 2D animation e-learning platform designed to support 
beginner animators, particularly in low-resource environments. The system integrates intuitive drawing tools, frame-by-frame and timeline-based animation modes, and a third-party AI assistant for sketch enhancement and automated coloring suggestions. It also features interactive tutorials, a progress tracker, and a personalized user dashboard to promote structured learning and creative development.
